verses.verse: לְמַחְלְק֖וֹת <S%H4256><s%> le-mach-le-Kot Concerning the divisions לְשֹׁעֲרִ֑ים <S%H7778><s%> le-sho-'a-Rim; of the porters לַקָּרְחִ֕ים <S%H7145><s%> lak-ka-re-Chim Of the Korhites מְשֶֽׁלֶמְיָ֥הוּ <S%H4920><s%> me-she-lem-Ya-hu [was] Meshelemiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son קֹרֵ֖א <S%H6981><s%> ko-Re of Kore מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the sons אָסָֽף׃ <S%H623><s%> 'a-Saf. of Asaph

וְלִמְשֶֽׁלֶמְיָ֖הוּ <S%H4920><s%> ve-lim-she-lem-Ya-hu of Meshelemiah בָּנִ֑ים <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim; And the sons זְכַרְיָ֤הוּ <S%H2148><s%> ze-char-Ya-hu [were] Zechariah הַבְּכוֹר֙ <S%H1060><s%> hab-be-chOr the firstborn יְדִֽיעֲאֵ֣ל <S%H3043><s%> ye-di-'a-'El Jediael הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni, the second זְבַדְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H2069><s%> ze-vad-Ya-hu Zebadiah הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi, the third יַתְנִיאֵ֖ל <S%H3496><s%> yat-ni-'El Jathniel הָרְבִיעִֽי׃ <S%H7243><s%> ha-re-vi-'I. the fourth

עֵילָ֤ם <S%H5867><s%> 'ei-Lam Elam הַחֲמִישִׁי֙ <S%H2549><s%> ha-cha-mi-Shi the fifth יְהוֹחָנָ֣ן <S%H3076><s%> ye-ho-cha-Nan Jehohanan הַשִּׁשִּׁ֔י <S%H8345><s%> hash-shish-Shi, the sixth אֶלְיְהוֹעֵינַ֖י <S%H454><s%> el-ye-ho-'ei-Nai Elioenai הַשְּׁבִיעִֽי׃ <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'I. the seventh

וּלְעֹבֵ֥ד u-le-'o-Ved אֱדֹ֖ם <S%H5654><s%> 'e-Dom of Obededom בָּנִ֑ים <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim; Moreover the sons שְׁמַֽעְיָ֤ה <S%H8098><s%> she-ma'-Yah [were] Shemaiah הַבְּכוֹר֙ <S%H1060><s%> hab-be-chOr the firstborn יְהוֹזָבָ֣ד <S%H3075><s%> ye-ho-za-Vad Jehozabad הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni, the second יוֹאָ֤ח <S%H3098><s%> yo-'Ach Joah הַשְּׁלִשִׁי֙ <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi the third וְשָׂכָ֣ר <S%H7940><s%> ve-sa-Char and Sacar הָרְבִיעִ֔י <S%H7243><s%> ha-re-vi-'I, the fourth וּנְתַנְאֵ֖ל <S%H5417><s%> u-ne-tan-'El and Nethaneel הַחֲמִישִֽׁי׃ <S%H2549><s%> ha-cha-mi-Shi. the fifth

עַמִּיאֵ֤ל <S%H5988><s%> 'am-mi-'El Ammiel הַשִּׁשִּׁי֙ <S%H8345><s%> hash-shish-Shi the sixth יִשָׂשכָ֣ר <S%H3485><s%> yi-so-sh-Char Issachar הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'I, the seventh פְּעֻלְּתַ֖י <S%H6469><s%> pe-'ul-le-Tai Peulthai הַשְּׁמִינִ֑י <S%H8066><s%> hash-she-mi-Ni; the eighth כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki had indeed בֵרֲכ֖וֹ <S%H1288><s%> ve-ra-Cho blessed אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him. for God פ Peh

וְלִֽשְׁמַֽעְיָ֤ה <S%H8098><s%> ve-lish-ma'-Yah Also unto Shemaiah בְנוֹ֙ <S%H1121><s%> ve-No his son נוֹלַ֣ד <S%H3205><s%> no-Lad born בָּנִ֔ים <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim, were sons הַמִּמְשָׁלִ֖ים <S%H4474><s%> ham-mi-sha-Lim that ruled לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit throughout the house אֲבִיהֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vi-Hem; of their father כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for גִבּ֥וֹרֵי <S%H1368><s%> gib-Bo-rei for they [were] mighty men חַ֖יִל <S%H2428><s%> Cha-yil of valour הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah. like

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons שְׁמַֽעְיָ֗ה <S%H8098><s%> she-ma'-Yah, of Shemaiah עָ֠תְנִי <S%H6273><s%> 'A-te-ni Othni וּרְפָאֵ֨ל <S%H7501><s%> u-re-fa-'El and Rephael וְעוֹבֵ֧ד <S%H5744><s%> ve-'o-Ved and Obed אֶלְזָבָ֛ד <S%H443><s%> 'el-za-Vad Elzabad אֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav whose brethren בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- men חָ֑יִל <S%H2428><s%> Cha-yil; [were] strong אֱלִיה֖וּ <S%H453><s%> 'e-li-Hu Elihu וּסְמַכְיָֽהוּ׃ <S%H5565><s%> u-se-mach-Ya-hu. and Semachiah

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all manner אֵ֜לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh these מִבְּנֵ֣י׀ <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei All these of the sons עֹבֵ֣ד 'o-Ved אֱדֹ֗ם <S%H5654><s%> 'e-Dom, of Obededom הֵ֤מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah they וּבְנֵיהֶם֙ <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-nei-Hem they and their sons וַאֲחֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H251><s%> va-'a-chei-Hem, and their brethren אִֽישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> 'ish- men חַ֥יִל <S%H2428><s%> Cha-yil able בַּכֹּ֖חַ <S%H3581><s%> bak-Ko-ach for strength לַעֲבֹדָ֑ה <S%H5656><s%> la-'a-vo-Dah; for the service שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <S%H8346><s%> shish-Shim [were] threescore וּשְׁנַ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Na-yim and two לְעֹבֵ֥ד le-'o-Ved אֱדֹֽם׃ <S%H5654><s%> 'e-Dom. of Obededom

וְלִמְשֶֽׁלֶמְיָ֗הוּ <S%H4920><s%> ve-lim-she-lem-Ya-hu, And Meshelemiah בָּנִ֧ים <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim had sons וְאַחִ֛ים <S%H251><s%> ve-'a-Chim and brethren בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- men חָ֖יִל <S%H2428><s%> Cha-yil strong שְׁמוֹנָ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> she-mo-Nah eight עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar. teen ס sa-Mek

וּלְחֹסָ֥ה <S%H2621><s%> u-le-cho-Sah Also Hosah מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the children מְרָרִ֖י <S%H4847><s%> me-ra-Ri of Merari בָּנִ֑ים <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim; had sons שִׁמְרִ֤י <S%H8113><s%> shim-Ri Simri הָרֹאשׁ֙ <S%H7218><s%> ha-roSh the chief כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah was not בְכ֔וֹר <S%H1060><s%> ve-Chor, (for [though] he was not the firstborn וַיְשִׂימֵ֥הוּ <S%H7760><s%> vay-si-Me-hu made אָבִ֖יהוּ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-hu yet his father לְרֹֽאשׁ׃ <S%H7218><s%> le-Rosh. the first

חִלְקִיָּ֤הוּ <S%H2518><s%> chil-ki-Ya-hu Hilkiah הַשֵּׁנִי֙ <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni the second טְבַלְיָ֣הוּ <S%H2882><s%> te-val-Ya-hu Tebaliah הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֔י <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi, the third זְכַרְיָ֖הוּ <S%H2148><s%> ze-char-Ya-hu Zechariah הָרְבִעִ֑י <S%H7243><s%> ha-re-vi-'I; the fourth כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all בָּנִ֧ים <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim all the sons וְאַחִ֛ים <S%H251><s%> ve-'a-Chim and brethren לְחֹסָ֖ה <S%H2621><s%> le-cho-Sah of Hosah שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah three עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar. ten

לְ֠אֵלֶּה <S%H428><s%> Le-'el-leh to these מַחְלְק֨וֹת <S%H4256><s%> mach-le-Kot Among these [were] the divisions הַשֹּֽׁעֲרִ֜ים <S%H7778><s%> hash-sho-'a-Rim of the porters לְרָאשֵׁ֧י <S%H7218><s%> le-ra-Shei [even] among the chief הַגְּבָרִ֛ים <S%H1397><s%> hag-ge-va-Rim men מִשְׁמָר֖וֹת <S%H4931><s%> mish-ma-Rot [having] wards לְעֻמַּ֣ת <S%H5980><s%> le-'um-Mat one against אֲחֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H251><s%> 'a-chei-Hem; another לְשָׁרֵ֖ת <S%H8334><s%> le-sha-Ret to minister בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit in the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וַיַּפִּ֨ילוּ <S%H5307><s%> vai-yap-Pi-lu And they cast גוֹרָל֜וֹת <S%H1486><s%> go-ra-Lot lots כַּקָּטֹ֧ן <S%H6996><s%> kak-ka-Ton as well the small כַּגָּד֛וֹל <S%H1419><s%> kag-ga-Dol as the great לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit according to the house אֲבוֹתָ֖ם <S%H1><s%> a-vo-Tam of their fathers לְשַׁ֥עַר <S%H8179><s%> le-Sha-'ar for every gate וָשָֽׁעַר׃ <S%H8179><s%> va-Sha-'ar. gate פ Peh

וַיִּפֹּ֧ל <S%H5307><s%> vai-yip-Pol fell הַגּוֹרָ֛ל <S%H1486><s%> hag-go-Ral And the lot מִזְרָ֖חָה <S%H4217><s%> miz-Ra-chah eastward לְשֶֽׁלֶמְיָ֑הוּ <S%H8018><s%> le-she-lem-Ya-hu; to Shelemiah וּזְכַרְיָ֨הוּ <S%H2148><s%> u-ze-char-Ya-hu Then for Zechariah בְנ֜וֹ <S%H1121><s%> ve-No his son יוֹעֵ֣ץ׀ <S%H3289><s%> yo-'Etz counsellor בְּשֶׂ֗כֶל <S%H7922><s%> be-Se-chel, a wise הִפִּ֙ילוּ֙ <S%H5307><s%> hip-Pi-lu they cast גּֽוֹרָל֔וֹת <S%H1486><s%> go-ra-Lot, lots וַיֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze came out גוֹרָל֖וֹ <S%H1486><s%> go-ra-Lo and his lot צָפֽוֹנָה׃ <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fo-nah. northward ס sa-Mek

לְעֹבֵ֥ד le-'o-Ved אֱדֹ֖ם <S%H5654><s%> 'e-Dom To Obededom נֶ֑גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> Neg-bah; southward וּלְבָנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> u-le-va-Nav and to his sons בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit the house הָאֲסֻפִּֽים׃ <S%H624><s%> ha-'a-sup-Pim. of Asuppim

לְשֻׁפִּ֤ים <S%H8206><s%> le-shup-Pim To Shuppim וּלְחֹסָה֙ <S%H2621><s%> u-le-cho-Sah and Hosah לַֽמַּעֲרָ֔ב <S%H4628><s%> lam-ma-'a-Rav, [the lot came forth] westward עִ֚ם <S%H5973><s%> 'im by שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> Sha-'ar with the gate שַׁלֶּ֔כֶת <S%H7996><s%> shal-Le-chet, Shallecheth בַּֽמְסִלָּ֖ה <S%H4546><s%> bam-sil-Lah by the causeway הָעוֹלָ֑ה <S%H5927><s%> ha-'o-Lah; of the going up מִשְׁמָ֖ר <S%H4929><s%> mish-Mar ward לְעֻמַּ֥ת <S%H5980><s%> le-'um-Mat against מִשְׁמָֽר׃ <S%H4929><s%> mish-Mar. ward

לַמִּזְרָח֮ <S%H4217><s%> lam-miz-Rach Eastward הַלְוִיִּ֣ם <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim Levites שִׁשָּׁה֒ <S%H8337><s%> shish-Shah [were] six לַצָּפ֤וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> latz-tza-Fo-nah northward לַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> lai-yOm a day אַרְבָּעָ֔ה <S%H702><s%> 'ar-ba-'Ah, four לַנֶּ֥גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> lan-Neg-bah southward לַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> lai-Yom a day אַרְבָּעָ֑ה <S%H702><s%> 'ar-ba-'Ah; four וְלָאֲסֻפִּ֖ים <S%H624><s%> ve-la-'a-sup-Pim and toward Asuppim שְׁנַ֥יִם <S%H8147><s%> she-Na-yim two שְׁנָֽיִם׃ <S%H8147><s%> she-Na-yim. [and] two

לַפַּרְבָּ֖ר <S%H6503><s%> lap-par-Bar At Parbar לַֽמַּעֲרָ֑ב <S%H4628><s%> lam-ma-'a-Rav; westward אַרְבָּעָה֙ <S%H702><s%> 'ar-ba-'Ah four לַֽמְסִלָּ֔ה <S%H4546><s%> lam-sil-Lah, at the causeway שְׁנַ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> she-Na-yim [and] two לַפַּרְבָּֽר׃ <S%H6503><s%> lap-par-Bar. at Parbar

אֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh, These מַחְלְקוֹת֙ <S%H4256><s%> mach-le-kOt These [are] the divisions הַשֹּׁ֣עֲרִ֔ים <S%H7778><s%> hash-Sho-'a-Rim, of the porters לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei among the sons הַקָּרְחִ֖י <S%H7145><s%> hak-ka-re-Chi of Kore וְלִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> ve-liv-Nei and among the sons מְרָרִֽי׃ <S%H4847><s%> me-ra-Ri. of Merari

וְֽהַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> ve-hal-vi-Yim; And of the Levites אֲחִיָּ֗ה <S%H281><s%> 'a-chi-Yah, Ahijah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- had charge אֽוֹצְרוֹת֙ <S%H214><s%> 'otz-rOt [was] over the treasures בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit of the house הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God וּלְאֹֽצְר֖וֹת <S%H214><s%> u-le-'o-tze-Rot and over the treasures הַקֳּדָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H6944><s%> hak-ko-da-Shim. of the dedicated things

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei [As concerning] the sons לַ֠עְדָּן <S%H3936><s%> La'-don of Laadan בְּנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the sons הַגֵּרְשֻׁנִּ֜י <S%H1649><s%> hag-ge-re-shun-Ni of the Gershonite לְלַעְדָּ֗ן <S%H3936><s%> le-la'-Dan, Laadan רָאשֵׁ֧י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei chief הָאָב֛וֹת <S%H1><s%> ha-'a-Vot fathers לְלַעְדָּ֥ן <S%H3936><s%> le-la'-Dan [even] of Laadan הַגֵּרְשֻׁנִּ֖י <S%H1649><s%> hag-ge-re-shun-Ni the Gershonite יְחִיאֵלִֽי׃ <S%H3172><s%> ye-chi-'e-Li. [were] Jehieli

בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons יְחִֽיאֵלִ֑י <S%H3172><s%> ye-chi-'e-Li; of Jehieli זֵתָם֙ <S%H2241><s%> ze-Tam Zetham וְיוֹאֵ֣ל <S%H3100><s%> ve-yo-'El and Joel אָחִ֔יו <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chiv, his brother עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- had charge אֹצְר֖וֹת <S%H214><s%> o-tze-Rot [which were] over the treasures בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD
